nodes.text: Tolan Navy Yards were a facility of the Imperial Navy at Tolan, located relatively close to Dankayo, and thus probably within a few sectors of Ralltiir.

When the Imperial Navy destroyed the Rebel base on Dankayo, the Imperial Armored Transport Elusive was charged with gathering and transporting wreckage from the facility, including sensitive datapacks. On leaving Dankayo, the Elusive was attacked by the Rebel shuttle Bonderium, but while she escaped, her captain ordered her to divert to Tolan for repairs.

While at the Navy Yard, the Elusive not only had her battle damage repaired, but was also fitted with an external rack carrying a force of TIE/LN starfighters. Her stopover in the yard was relatively brief, however, and she quickly resumed course for Coronar.
